overview:
Mario is serial entrepreneur enthusiastic about reputation management, social media and raising start-ups. He is one of the online reputation pioneers worldwide. Mario has already built the online reputation management (ORM) platform myonid.de©, in 2007, long before others were even thinking about ORM. He also launched secure.me, the global online service for online privacy and reputation protection in 2009 and iMedia Lounge©, Germany’s leading social media content management system, early 2010.

Mario knows the work in start-ups and international corporations inside out. He has been working in the online business since 1999. Mario held several management positions at Telefonica, the international telecommunications company, at eTF1, France’s leading online TV media group and at United Internet AG, the European Internet specialist. Back in the era of the New Economy, he worked for a Munich start-up. Mario studied engineering and business at the University of Applied Sciences in Munich.
